data.eml:eml: Two new species of the feather mite genus Trouessartia (Acari: Trouessartiidae) from Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantinescu, Ioana Cristina, Cobzaru, Ioana, Mukhim, D. Khlur B., Adam, Costică (2016): Two new species of the feather mite genus Trouessartia (Acari: Trouessartiidae) from Asia. Zootaxa 4137 (3): 357-374, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4137.3.4
